attributes.action: Immediate debate & vote of no-confidence in coalition government
attributes.additional_details: This government has shown itself unfit to govern because of sleaze, incompetence and collusion with commercial interests (health bill, NHS privatisation, News International scandal and many others). A vote of confidence/no-confidence should be called immediately with an open vote - no interference from govt whips. If the vote is of no-confidence, an immediate general election should be called.

rejection.details: Votes of no confidence are a matter for Parliament not the Government.
